Description:
UNIQUE INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
This level block is the carpark for the Grandvue land sales office. It is currently leased at a great return with a 3% increase each year. There are 2 years left to run on the lease.
Once the land sales office closes, this bock will be a brilliant place to build your new home or investment property.
Close to the Arena @ Officer shopping complex, school and public transport. The allotment is 530m2.

Description:
Downsize to a bigger life
This charming boutique home presents the perfect change of lifestyle you have been searching for. Situated in one of the most highly sought-after communities, Lifestyle Officer. With everything you could need at your fingertips, what else could you want?
This beautiful home offers two spacious bedrooms, an open plan kitchen and dining area and a separate living zone. The modern kitchen boasting with natural light consists of stone benches, stainless steel appliances, overheard cupboards, pendant lighting and ample storage. Fitted with split system heating and cooling, you will be comfortable all year round. The outdoor covered alfresco is perfect for those who love to entertain.
Enjoy the unlimited use and access to the five-star facilities here at Lifestyle, including indoor heated pool, bowling green, cinema, gym and much more!
Insights: 92/114 Rix Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
The Perfect Downsizer
Located within a few steps to Arena Shopping Centre and an easy drive to Monash Freeway is this near new home offering the fortunate buyer a lock and go lifestyle. The contemporary residence boasts 3 bedrooms, kitchen, incorporating dining and family room with an upstairs retreat. Features en suite to master, heating, split system heating and cooling and direct entry to the double, remote garage. A private courtyard is the perfect space for entertaining. The location is ideal for those travelling on the freeway and buyers who appreciate a lifestyle of convenience, within minutes to schooling, public transport, Officer and Pakenham townships.
Contact - Amanda Charles
0400 347 968

Description:
Timeless Elegance for Family Enjoyment- Timbertop Estate
Hit the heights of family living and park your future in the ultimate family location! Set close to Arena Shopping Centre, transport, freeway & Princes Highway, parkland/playground and multiple school,s this impressive three bedroom plus study, two bathroom home is an inspection you will not want to miss.
This home is high on the family comforts, including large master, walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity. The study/nursery is located off the master which has double sliding doors so working or getting up to your baby at night has never been so convenient, all other rooms are in great size with built in robes and two separate living zones including rumpus room. A well-appointed open plan kitchen, dining and living with walk in pantry, stone bench top, quality stainless steel appliances including 900mm stove, oven and dishwasher.
Fantastic for entertaining! The outdoor living is complete with under roof alfresco and low maintenance gardens which is all situated on an approx. block size of 462m2.
Additional features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, NBN, 9ft. ceilings, remote double garage, internal and external access.
If you are looking for quality, space and a desirable location then look no further than this 3-years young gem at 67 Timbertop Boulevard, Officer. You will not be disappointed.
Insights: 67 Timbertop Boulevard, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2013 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Outstanding Value In Arena
If you’re looking to enter the market or add to your investment portfolio, then look no further than right here. Currently tenanted until October 2018 and collecting $1473 per calendar month in rent this property offers not only a prized location close to shops, amenities and public transport but an effortless floor plan with three bedrooms, two bathrooms and two separately zoned living areas. The home rests on a comfortable 373sqm parcel of land for easy low maintenance living. Additional features for every day comforts include ducted heating, split system cooling, double remote garage with internal access and roller door access to rear.

Description:
Modern Family Living
Located in the established Arena Estate, is this dream home, perfect for families, first home buyers and the savvy investor. The open plan living is the focal point, with gourmet kitchen with stone benchtops and quality appliances, complemented by the spacious WIP. Flowing to the light filled family meals, as well as the spacious lounge area. Sleeping accommodation includes that of the master suite with WIR, and private ensuite with twin basin. The three remaining bedrooms are serviced by BIR, the main bathroom, and open to a convenient children's retreat. Additionally, there is a rumpus room, as well as a family study - a floorplan that ensures space, practicality and versatility.
Outside features alfresco living for the keen entertainer, whilst the backyard is generous in size, and a blank canvas to make your own. Potential for a pool or extended outsize living.
Creature comforts include; evaporative cooling, gas heating, fresh coat of paint, and internal access from the double lock up garage with rear roller door. Close proximity to Beaconsfield Town, Lakeside shops, esteemed schools, public transport, freeway access as well as medical and sport facilities.
Enquire today and secure your future.
Insights: 13 Silverleaf Crescent, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Mary Street Frontage new unit
Just listed for sale, this one will sell quickly as it's street frontage to Mary Street, located over the road from the Arcadia Estate and a short distance from shops, the train station and the freeway.
Ideal for investors, first home buyers and downsizers, this brand new unit is close to completion, if you are looking for a place to move in soon, maybe this is the one.
- 2 bedrooms
- master bedroom with ensuite access and a walk in wardrobe
- separate lounge and kitchen/dining rooms
- alfresco
- Land size is 248m2
- building size is 13.36sqs including the garage
- single garage
Package includes landscaping, blinds, tv antenna, letterbox, clothesline plus there is an optional upgrade package for $4000 which includes a split system aircon, dishwasher and a remote garage door.
First home buyers who qualify for the first home buyers grant get stamp duty concessions and $10,000 towards the purchase price.
Call Adam Lord on 0422 229 723 for an inspection.
Artists impressions shown is for illustrative purposes only and may differ from the property being sold, plans and prices are subject to change without notice.

Description:
4 Years Young, Comfort & Convenience
Located in the Arcadia Estate in Officer and only 4 years young sits this low maintenance neat & tidy home suited for first home buyers, the savvy investor, retiree or people wanting to downsize.
The home comprises of three double bedrooms, master bedroom entailing walk in robe and ensuite. The other two bedrooms have built in robes and a shared second bathroom. Moving throughout the home the floorplan is practical and ideal with a kitchen to impress the chef of the house hold including oven/stovetop, dishwasher and breakfast bar overlooking the decent sized open plan dining/ living area. Interior extras include ducted heating and split system cooling.
Outside you have a private low maintenance yard with garden shed. Also included is the single remote garage & second parking space with internal access and side gate access.
Situated in a fantastic location! Close to Cardinia Road Train Station, M1 Freeway via Cardinia Road, choice of schools and Shopping centre.
Be quick to attend the first open inspection as it won’t last long.
Insights: 17 Harold Street, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

And this could not come at a better time for you. If you're a first-home-buyer not only will you save on stamp duty but you're also in line to receive the $10,000 rebate. As an investor you can expect seven complete years worth of depreciation.
Located at the frontier of Officer's expansion, the property is literally within walking distance from schools, shops and train station. It's also perfectly positioned overlooking the lake.

All of this could be yours within 30 days.
The property is located on Bridge Road (immediately off Cardinia Road). If you still have struggle finding the property Google Niki Place and it's opposite the entryway of Niki Place.

Description:
Titled Land in Timbertop Estate
Ready to be built on, this highly sought after titled block in the prestigious Timbertop Estate gives you the space to build your dream home, which measures a hefty 611m2 and is ready for you to start building on right away.
With a frontage of 16.5m and a Length of 37m you should be able to fit almost anything your heart desires on this land.
Strategically positioned close enough to shopping centre's, elite schools, public transport and amazing parks that Cardinia Shire offers however not too close that it detracts the peace and serenity.

Description:
Be impressed in Arcadia, Officer
A short stroll to the Officer Club, cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, schools and Cardinia Rd Train Station, this immaculate Metricon built home will leave you impressed. Ideal for first home buyers, investors and down sizers alike, it comprises an extensive features including:
•Sun drenched spacious open living area
•Ceaser stone bench top throughout kitchen area including a large island bench measured 2300mm x 1220mm
•Dining area suitable for an eight seat dining table with a window view of the leafy garden
•Three generous sized bedrooms, the master bedroom features a WIR with a generous sized en-suite and the other bedrooms with built-in robe serviced by a second bathroom
•Down lights throughout kitchen, living and dining area
•Chandelier lighting
•Laundry with built-in shelving system
•Hardwood timber (spotted gum) deck at entrance and outdoor entertainment area
•Add-on alfresco perfect for outdoor entertainment
•Double garage
•A vast entertainers' courtyard with the divine splash of garden greenery and flowers
•Topping along the side of house with a security lock gate
•Tastefully used neutral colours throughout interior and exterior design
•Ducted heating and evaporative cooling system and the list goes on
With land prices ever rising in Officer and not much on offer, this opportunity is not to be missed. Only less than 5 mins drive to the M1 freeway and princes highway, enjoy the very best in seamless indoor-outdoor living on offer. Call Savan on 0426709631 for an inspection.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
UNDER CONTRACT
Situated within the highly sought after Arena at Officer, the estate provides a great lifestyle for those who are looking for the convenience of everything being within easy reach to park lands and walk ways, Arena Shopping Centre, local schools, easy access to M1 and a short drive to the Officer Train Station.
At 15 Kooyong Close Officer you will find an immaculate ex display home up for offer.
You will be wowed from the moment you walk in the door with its high standard fittings such as timber floors, high ceilings, and also provides a lovely welcome home feeling.
The home comprises an oversized master bedroom with not just one, but two walk in robes. A large ensuite with his and hers vanities, large shower and separate toilet.
A formal front lounge room with bi-folding doors that opens up to the beautifully established and manicured gardens.
In the heart of the home you will find a large open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances including gas cooktop & oven, dishwasher and in-built microwave. Stone waterfall benches, ample storage and walk in pantry.
If you love to entertain you will love the bifold doors that open up from the kitchen and living room which leads you out to outdoor deck that will leave your friends green with envy, with an inbuilt bbq area and fire place and not to mention the professionally landscaped gardens and artificial lawn.
The home offers three additional bedrooms which all come complete with built in robes and easy access to the family bathroom.
Other great inclusions of this home are:
Double lock up garage
Gas Ducted Heating
Evaporative Cooling
Alarm System & CCTV
Be sure to inspect today as tomorrow it could be gone!
House Size:29.9 squares
Land Size: 650m2

Description:
All the bells and whistles.
*Please note that the front of the property is on Stephens Road.
Situated opposite attractive parklands in a quiet pocket of Officer is this fabulous 4-bedroom family home plus study nook and featuring 4 spacious living zones.
- Boasting; open plan family meals, theatre room, formal lounge and kids retreat areas.
- The stunning kitchen features; granite bench tops, soft close drawers. Smeg stainless steel appliances including dishwasher.
- Key inclusions are; powder room, refrigerated cooling and gas ducted heating, CCTV, large alfresco, low maintenance gardens, long reinforced driveway and 3 phase power to the triple garage.
Situated in the Central Park Estate you'll be located just a short drive to the Monash Freeway, Arena Shopping Centre with its plethora of shops and local schools and transport.

Description:
*** SOLD by Robert Petelinek at AgentX Real Estate Berwick ***
Positioned on a prime corner location in the Grandvue Estate Officer opposite St Francis Xavier College & St Clare’s Catholic Primary School) is this amazing & very stylish family home. Offering you:
* Four bedrooms with an HUGE oversized master bedroom, complete with walk in robe and private ensuite. Remaining bedrooms are all large & oversized witted fitted wardrobes & share a further bathroom.
* Centralised kitchen, complete with island bench, a plethora of under bench & overhead cupboard space, stone bench tops & s/s appliances with dishwasher.
* Open planned main living zone with separated dining area.
* Westerly facing alfresco entertaining area, complete with extended decking with closable blinds & styled landscaped rear garden with established plants & garden shed.
Further completed by ducted heating, evaporative cooling, gorgeous quality porcelain tiling throughout main areas, LED lighting, quality window furnishings throughout, feature gas log fire place, alarm system, NBN available, recycled water, internal garage access & so much more…
A very stylish home with amazing finishes in the estate that everyone wants to live in, this surely ticks all the boxes.
